data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Guantánamo prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Guantánamo, Cuba
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Guantánamo, Cuba to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 8 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 57,913 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Guantánamo
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of La Máquina
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of La Máquina, Guantánamo, Cuba.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Guantánamo to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Guantánamo against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.section_summary:
the state of Guantánamo, Cuba has a population of 510,900.

We estimate Guantánamo has 57,913 people who might know Jesus, 229,273 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 223,714 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 8 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Guantánamo, Cuba, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

location.name: Guantánamo
location.cities_list: Guantánamo, Baracoa, Maisí, Río Guayabal de Yateras, La Máquina
